verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh my soul
Oh how you worry, Oh how you weary from fearing
You lost control
This was the one thing you didn't see coming
And no one would blame you, no
If you cried in private, If you tried to hide it away
So no one knows
No one will see if you stop believing

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh my soul, you are not alone
There's a place where fear
Has to face the God you know
One more day, He will make a way
Let Him show you how you can lay this down
'Cause You're not alone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Here and now,
You can be honest, I won't try to promise
That someday it all works out
Cause this is the valley, and even now he is breathing
On your dry bones
And there will be dancing
There will be beauty where beauty was ash and stone
This much I know

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Oh my soul, you are not alone
There's a place where fear
Has to face the God you know
One more day, He will make a way
Let Him show you how you can lay this down

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I'm not strong enough
I can't take anymore
(You can lay it down, you can lay it down)
And my shipwrecked faith will never get me to shore
(You can lay it down, you can lay it down)
Can He find me here
Can He keep me from going under

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Oh my soul, you are not alone
There's a place where fear
Has to face the God you know
One more day, He will make a way
Let Him show you how you can lay this down
'Cause You're not alone
